name: my-phaser-game
description: A Phaser 3 Hello World game using Bun and TypeScript

scripts.build: bun build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target browser && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp index.html dist/
scripts.dev: bun --watch build src/main.ts --outdir dist --target browser && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp index.html dist/
